As usual, despite the acute control of error, not passed any "skirt." Lands, even in bed Lali - Aunt girl, A wealthy producer tombstones. Steals a little, a little mess, and most of all weapons before the marriage bond. In the end, the festive suit stands alongside the pale white. But will assume the wedding ring?
